location: Chengde Road Section 4, near Jiantan MRT (258m) and Yuanshan Palace MRT (86m)
notes: Spacious 3BR/2BA on high floor (12/15F) in elevator building with security management and gated community. Includes parking and allows cooking with natural gas. Two balconies present - would need to verify railing safety for baby. No pets allowed. Excellent location near MRT stations and Jiantan Elementary School. Unable to assess interior condition/modernity without viewing actual photos.
